attributes.action: introduce a retrospective qualification to the employment of the Attorney General, stating that they may not remain in office if he/she is found to have broken the law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The highest law officer in the land should not be allowed to remain in office if he/she breaches the law.

By the very nature of the position, they should be beyond reproach.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
